With LIBROSYNC, you can browse available books, read announcements, and search easily using smart filters. services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover the wide range of services we offer to support your learning journey

service1.title: Offer a Collection of Books
service1.description: Explore a diverse range of books across different genres and subjects, curated to support your growth.

service2.title: Borrow Books
service2.description: Easily borrow books to take home and enjoy at your own pace, supporting your love for reading.

service3.title: Free Use of PC
service3.description: Access our computers for free to study, research, or complete school and work projects efficiently.

service4.title: Open Hours
service4.description: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Visit us anytime within our service hours.

service5.title: Free Document Printing
service5.description: Cut-off for printing is from 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM. Print your documents at no cost during this time.

about.title: About
about.description: We are pleased to share our mission and vision for a brighter future for the youth and our community.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.text: Pangunahin sa aming adhikain ay ang mapaigting pa ang interes ng mga bata sa pagbabasa dahil iba pa rin ang naibibigay na kasiyahan ng pagbabasa. Nais din naming makatulong na mapalawak ang kaalaman at karunungan ng mga bata.

vision.title: VISION
vision.text: Ang magkaroon ng mga mamamayan na sagana sa karunungan upang makapaghahatid ng masaganang pamumuhay sa bawat pamilya at makadaragdag sa kaunlaran ng ating bayan.
